title: HADDPS â€” Packed Single-FP Horizontal Add

fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`HADDPS xmm1, xmm2/m128`
`VHADDPS xmm1, xmm2, xmm3/m128`
`VHADDPS ymm1, ymm2, ymm3/m256`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Adds the single-precision floating-point values in the first and second dwords of the destination operand and stores the result in the first dword of the destination operand.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: Adds single-precision floating-point values in the third and fourth dword of the destination operand and stores the result in the second dword of the destination operand.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: Adds single-precision floating-point values in the first and second dword of the source operand and stores the result in the third dword of the destination operand.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: Adds single-precision floating-point values in the third and fourth dword of the source operand and stores the result in the fourth dword of the destination operand.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: In 64-bit mode, use of the REX.R prefix permits this instruction to access additional registers (XMM8-XMM15).

fields.name: ​
fields.value: See Figure 3-18 for HADDPS; see Figure 3-19 for VHADDPS.
